verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, When <WH3588> either <WH376> man <WH376> or <WH176> woman <WH802> shall separate <WH6381> themselves to vow <WH5087> a vow <WH5088> of a Nazarite, <WH5139> to separate <WH5144> themselves to the LORD: <WH3068>

He shall separate <WH5144> himself from wine <WH3196> and strong drink, <WH7941> and shall drink <WH8354> no <WH3808> vinegar <WH2558> of wine, <WH3196> or vinegar <WH2558> of strong drink, <WH7941> neither <WH3808> shall he drink <WH8354> any <WH3605> liquor <WH4952> of grapes, <WH6025> nor <WH3808> eat <WH398> moist <WH3892> grapes, <WH6025> or dried. <WH3002>
All <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of his separation <WH5145> shall he eat <WH398> nothing <WH3808> that is made <WH6213> of the vine <WH3196> tree, from the kernels <WH2785> even to the husk. <WH2085>

All <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of the vow <WH5088> of his separation <WH5145> there shall no <WH3808> razor <WH8593> come <WH5674> on his head: <WH7218> until <WH5704> the days <WH3117> be fulfilled, <WH4390> in the which <WH834> he separates <WH5144> himself to the LORD, <WH3068> he shall be holy, <WH6918> and shall let the locks <WH6545> of the hair <WH8181> of his head <WH7218> grow. <WH1431>
All <WH3605> the days <WH3117> that he separates <WH5144> himself to the LORD <WH3068> he shall come <WH935> at no <WH3808> dead <WH4191> body. <WH5315>

He shall not make himself unclean <WH2930> for his father, <WH1> or for his mother, <WH517> for his brother, <WH251> or for his sister, <WH269> when they die: <WH4194> because <WH3588> the consecration <WH5145> of his God <WH430> is on his head. <WH7218>
All <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of his separation <WH5145> he is holy <WH6918> to the LORD. <WH3068>

And if <WH3588> any man die <WH4191> very <WH6621> suddenly <WH6597> by him, and he has defiled <WH2930> the head <WH7218> of his consecration; <WH5145> then he shall shave <WH1548> his head <WH7218> in the day <WH3117> of his cleansing, <WH2893> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> shall he shave <WH1548> it.

And on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> he shall bring <WH935> two <WH8147> turtles, <WH8449> or <WH176> two <WH8147> young <WH1121> pigeons, <WH3123> to the priest, <WH3548> to the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150>

And the priest <WH3548> shall offer <WH6213> the one <WH259> for a sin <WH2403> offering, and the other <WH259> for a burnt <WH5930> offering, and make an atonement <WH3722> for him, for that he sinned <WH2398> by the dead, <WH5315> and shall hallow <WH6942> his head <WH7218> that same <WH1931> day. <WH3117>

And he shall consecrate <WH5144> to the LORD <WH3068> the days <WH3117> of his separation, <WH5145> and shall bring <WH935> a lamb <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> for a trespass <WH817> offering: but the days <WH3117> that were before <WH7223> shall be lost, <WH5307> because <WH3588> his separation <WH5145> was defiled. <WH2930>

And this <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the Nazarite, <WH5139> when the days <WH3117> of his separation <WH5145> are fulfilled: <WH4390> he shall be brought <WH935> to the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150>

And he shall offer <WH7126> his offering <WH7133> to the LORD, <WH3068> one <WH259> he lamb <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without <WH8549> blemish <WH8549> for a burnt <WH5930> offering, and one <WH259> ewe <WH3535> lamb <WH3535> of the first <WH1323> year <WH8141> without <WH8549> blemish <WH8549> for a sin <WH2403> offering, and one <WH259> ram <WH352> without <WH8549> blemish <WH8549> for peace <WH8002> offerings,

And a basket <WH5536> of unleavened <WH4682> bread, cakes <WH2471> of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> and wafers <WH7550> of unleavened <WH4682> bread anointed <WH4886> with oil, <WH8081> and their meat offering, <WH4503> and their drink <WH5262> offerings.
And the priest <WH3548> shall bring <WH7126> them before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and shall offer <WH6213> his sin <WH2403> offering, and his burnt <WH5930> offering:

And he shall offer <WH6213> the ram <WH352> for a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace <WH8002> offerings to the LORD, <WH3068> with the basket <WH5536> of unleavened <WH4682> bread: the priest <WH3548> shall offer <WH6213> also his meat offering, <WH4503> and his drink <WH5262> offering.

And the Nazarite <WH5139> shall shave <WH1548> the head <WH7218> of his separation <WH5145> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> and shall take <WH3947> the hair <WH8181> of the head <WH7218> of his separation, <WH5145> and put <WH5414> it in the fire <WH784> which <WH834> is under <WH8478> the sacrifice <WH2077> of the peace <WH8002> offerings.

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> the sodden <WH1311> shoulder <WH2220> of the ram, <WH352> and one <WH259> unleavened <WH4682> cake <WH2471> out of the basket, <WH5536> and one <WH259> unleavened <WH4682> wafer, <WH7550> and shall put <WH5414> them on the hands <WH3709> of the Nazarite, <WH5139> after <WH310> the hair of his separation <WH5145> is shaven: <WH1548>

And the priest <WH3548> shall wave <WH5130> them for a wave <WH8573> offering before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> this <WH1931> is holy <WH6944> for the priest, <WH3548> with the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and heave <WH8641> shoulder: <WH7785> and after <WH310> that the Nazarite <WH5139> may drink <WH8354> wine. <WH3196>

This <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the Nazarite <WH5139> who <WH834> has vowed, <WH5087> and of his offering <WH7133> to the LORD <WH3068> for his separation, <WH5145> beside <WH905> that that his hand <WH3027> shall get: <WH5381> according <WH6310> to the vow <WH5088> which <WH834> he vowed, <WH5087> so <WH3651> he must do <WH6213> after <WH5921> the law <WH8451> of his separation. <WH5145>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
Speak <WH1696> to Aaron <WH175> and to his sons, <WH1121> saying, <WH559> On this <WH3541> wise you shall bless <WH1288> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying <WH559> to them,
The LORD <WH3068> bless <WH1288> you, and keep <WH8104> you:
The LORD <WH3068> make his face <WH6440> shine <WH215> on you, and be gracious <WH2603> to you:
The LORD <WH3068> lift <WH5375> up his countenance <WH6440> on you, and give <WH7760> you peace. <WH7965>
And they shall put <WH7760> my name <WH8034> on the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and I will bless <WH1288> them.
